About Me

I am a full-stack software developer living in Chicago who comes from a teaching background with degrees in Political Science, English Literature, and Education. I entered tech to see what else was out there. Turns out, there's a lot!

Javascript | React & Redux | ExpressJS | NodeJS | Python | Flask | PostgreSQL
